C

CBShop - Class in net.cubebeaters.cbshop
This class that extends plugin will allow players to purchase all the Items they want with cash in a nice clean GUI

createArmorMenu() - Method in class net.cubebeaters.cbshop.CBShop
Creates all the contents of the Armor Shop
createMainMenu() - Method in class net.cubebeaters.cbshop.CBShop
Creates all the options In the main menu.

I

itemTransaction(Player, Material, int, int, ClickType) - Method in class net.cubebeaters.cbshop.CBShop
This method decides how much to charge the player for 'item' and allows players to also sell to the server for resale price if they right click the item.

onInventoryClick(InventoryClickEvent) - Method in class net.cubebeaters.cbshop.CBShop

S

This method hooks into the servers default economy plugin.
